registerPage.heading: Hello Hooman, it's nice to meet you!
registerPage.subHeading: Register today and join the club.
registerPage.terribleError: Something has gone very wrong, please try again later.
registerPage.registrationSuccessful: You've successfully registered to the club!
registerPage.checkYourEmail: Go ahead and check your email to confirm your account.

validation.emailFormat: Please enter a valid email address e.g. buddy@gmail.com.
validation.passwordFormat: Password must contain at least one lowercase and uppercase character, a number and a special character.
validation.passwordTooShort: Password length should be at least 4 characters.
validation.passwordTooLong: Password cannot exceed more than 12 characters.

completeRegistrationPage.weWillBeInTouch: We'll be in touch as soon as we're closer to launching so keep an eye on your inbox.
completeRegistrationPage.fillInYourDetails: If you feel like filling in some details to help us better understand your needs then click the link below!

loginPage.heading: Welcome back, beautiful hooman!
loginPage.subHeading: Sign in to book a dog walk, view latest activities and so much more!

validation.emailFormat: Please enter a valid email address e.g. buddy@gmail.com.

resendRegistrationLinkPage.heading: Resend account activation link
resendRegistrationLinkPage.subHeading: After you submit the form, you will receive an email with an activation link - click on the link to complete the process.
resendRegistrationLinkPage.successMessage: The registration link has been sent. Go ahead and check your inbox!

validation.emailFormat: Please enter a valid email address e.g. buddy@gmail.com.

forgotPasswordPage.heading: We're all a bit forgetful at times...
forgotPasswordPage.subHeading: After you submit the form, you will receive an email with an activation link - click on the link to complete the process.
forgotPasswordPage.successMessage: The registration link has been sent. Go ahead and check your inbox!

validation.emailFormat: Please enter a valid email address e.g. buddy@gmail.com.

completeForgotPasswordPage.heading: Complete your password reset!
completeForgotPasswordPage.subHeading: After you update your password you will automatically get logged in with your new credentials.

validation.passwordFormat: Password must contain at least one lowercase and uppercase character, a number and a special character.
validation.passwordTooShort: Password length should be at least 4 characters.
validation.passwordTooLong: Password cannot exceed more than 12 characters.
